code: import React from'react';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{ErrorMessage,Formik,Form,Field}from'formik';import*as yup from'yup';import axios from'axios';import{history}from'../../history';import'../login/Login.css';var Register=function Register(){var handleSubmit=function handleSubmit(values){axios.post('http://localhost:8080/v1/api/user',values).then(function(resp){var data=resp.data;if(data){history.push('/');}});};var validations=yup.object().shape({email:yup.string().email().required(),password:yup.string().min(8).required()});return React.createElement("div",{id:"sign-up",className:"small-container"},React.createElement("h3",null,"Registre-se"),React.createElement("div",{className:"box-group"},React.createElement(Formik,{initialValues:{},onSubmit:handleSubmit,validationSchema:validations},React.createElement(Form,{className:"Login"},React.createElement("div",{className:"Login-Group"},React.createElement(Field,{name:"firstName",className:"Login-Field",placeholder:"Nome"}),React.createElement(ErrorMessage,{component:"span",name:"firstName",className:"Login-Error"})),React.createElement("div",{className:"Login-Group"},React.createElement(Field,{name:"email",className:"Login-Field",placeholder:"Email"}),React.createElement(ErrorMessage,{component:"span",name:"email",className:"Login-Error"})),React.createElement("div",{className:"Login-Group"},React.createElement(Field,{name:"password",className:"Login-Field",placeholder:"Senha"}),React.createElement(ErrorMessage,{component:"span",name:"password",className:"Login-Error"})),React.createElement("button",{className:"Login-Btn",type:"submit"},"Register"))),React.createElement("div",{id:"btn-login"},React.createElement(Link,{to:"/"},"Login"))));};export default Register;
